sourcesContent:
import { useSelector } from "react-redux" function CalendarEvent(props){ const {event} = props const date_ = new Date(event.date) const menu = useSelector(state => state.global.menu) return(
{event.event}
{`${(date_.getHours()+2 >= 24?(date_.getHours()+2)%24:(date_.getHours()+2)).toString().padStart(2,'0')}:${date_.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2,'0')}`}
Country
{event.country}
Currency
{event.currency}
Actual
{event.actual}
Estimate
{event.estimate}
Previous
{event.previous}
Change
{event.change.toFixed(2)}
Change %
{event.changePercentage.toFixed(1).toString()+'%'}
) } export default CalendarEvent
